articles.description: The South African big hitter breaks down his approach to six-hitting, physically and mentally
articles.content: Heinrich Klaasen has been in phenomenal T20 form since the start of 2023, hitting innumerable sixes and striking at over 180. AB de Villiers ranks him as the best player of spin in the format current… [+17724 chars]
